poem:
Title: "Morning Revelations"

As I sip morning tea infused with the unknown,
I sense the shifty silhouette of a withheld truth.
Crafts of light, dancing on a cosmic sea,
Their hidden passage, the last untouched frontier.
In their denial, a sharpened curiosity grows,
An alien epistle in our earthly prose.
The mystery within our grasp remains untamed,
Upon mankind, the universe's secret shame.
